title: Forget "Workington Man" – if the Tories want to win a majority, the only way is Essex
text:
The Tories should unite their potential voters around a narrative of aspiration and opportunity

Boris Johnson dreams of turning the electoral map blue on December 12. But he should remember that there’s already a place where this has happened, where the Tories are utterly dominant and not a single Member of Parliament is of Corbyn’s ilk. It’s called Essex.

The "Essex man" the Conseratives should be targeting is less likely to have gone to university, leans culturally conservative and importantly for this election, voted to leave the European Union. They’re the go-getters, the self-starters, the plumber and the marketer, the barrow boy and the banker. They are financially aspirational and entrepreneurial....
description: The Tories should unite their potential voters around a narrative of aspiration and opportunity
